name: Shed Tail
summary: You can shed your tail to escape.
description:
You can shed your tail to escape. You cease being grabbed, then Stride without triggering any reactions from the creature that grabbed you. It takes 1 week for your tail to fully grow back. Until it does, you can’t use your tail unarmed attack, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
